description: This table contains information for tracking registration history event notes.

columns.name: NOTE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the note record.

columns.name: REG_HX_EVENT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The Reg History event type category number for the Reg History event being tracked.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Patient created


Patient encounter created


Patient encounter deleted


Visit hospital account assigned


Visit account assigned


Guarantor added to patient


Coverage added to patient


Guarantor removed from patient


Coverage removed from patient


Visit account removed


Visit coverage assigned


Visit coverage removed


Hospital account created


Patient verified


Encounter verified


Guarantor verified


Coverage verified


Coverage member verified


Hospital account verified


Hospital account verified - second stamp


Benefits verified for encounter


Coverage benefits verified for encounter


Guarantor created


Coverage added to guarantor


Coverage removed from guarantor


PB visit created


PB visit coverage list change


Coverage created


Coverage member line added


Coverage member line removed


Coverage effective date change


Professional filing order change


MSPQ filing order change


Hospital filing order change


Hospital account coverage list change


Member effective date change


Member lines merged


Address change


Confirmation error

columns.name: REG_HX_OPEN_PAT_CSN
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for the contact of the open patient encounter at the time of the note creation.

columns.name: REG_HX_ENTRY_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time when the note was created. If the date is null, the default value is 01/01/1900. If the time is null, the default value is 00:00.

columns.name: REG_HX_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user logged in when the note was generated.

columns.name: REG_HX_LOGIN_DEP_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the login department where the note was generated.

columns.name: REG_HX_SRC_EAR_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the account where an address change occurred in an address change event.

columns.name: REG_HX_SRC_CVG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the coverage for which the subscriber's address changed in an address change event.

columns.name: REG_HX_CITY_OLD
columns.description: The previous city for an address change event.

columns.name: REG_HX_STATE_OLD_C_NAME
columns.description:
The previous state for an address change event.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: REG_HX_ZIP_OLD
columns.description: The previous ZIP/postal code for an address change event.

columns.name: REG_HX_CNTRY_OLD_C_NAME
columns.description:
The previous country for an address change event.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: REG_HX_CNTY_OLD_C_NAME
columns.description:
The previous county for an address change event.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: REG_HX_HN_OLD
columns.description: The previous house number for an address change event.

columns.name: REG_HX_DSTRCT_OLD_C_NAME
columns.description:
The previous district for an address change event.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: CONFRM_ERR_FINIS_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the confirmation record that triggered a warning or error was a finish confirmation record.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: REG_HX_OLD_EFFFR_DT
columns.description: The old effective-from date when a coverage-level effective date was changed.  If the date is null, the default value is 01/01/1900.

columns.name: REG_HX_NEW_EFFFR_DT
columns.description: The new effective-from date when a coverage-level effective date was changed.  If the date is null, the default value is 01/01/1900.

columns.name: REG_HX_OLD_EFFTO_DT
columns.description: The old effective-to date when a coverage-level effective date was changed.  If the date is null, the default value is 01/01/1900.

columns.name: REG_HX_NEW_EFFTO_DT
columns.description: The new effective-to date when a coverage-level effective date was changed.  If the date is null, the default value is 01/01/1900.

columns.name: REG_HX_CITY_NEW
columns.description: The new city for an address change event.

columns.name: REG_HX_STATE_NEW_C_NAME
columns.description:
The new state for an address change event.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: REG_HX_STATE_OLD_C_NAME

columns.name: REG_HX_ZIP_NEW
columns.description: The new ZIP/postal code for an address change event.

columns.name: REG_HX_CNTRY_NEW_C_NAME
columns.description:
The new country for an address change event.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: REG_HX_CNTRY_OLD_C_NAME

columns.name: REG_HX_CNTY_NEW_C_NAME
columns.description:
The new county for an address change event.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: REG_HX_CNTY_OLD_C_NAME

columns.name: REG_HX_HN_NEW
columns.description: The new house number for an address change event.

columns.name: REG_HX_DSTRCT_NEW_C_NAME
columns.description:
The new district for an address change event.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: REG_HX_DSTRCT_OLD_C_NAME

columns.name: REG_HX_VERF_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the verification record associated with the verification event for this row.  This column is frequently used to link to the VERIFICATION table.

columns.name: REG_HX_FO_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The source of a filing order change.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


User Edit


MSPQ Responses


Manual Accept From WQ


Manual Reject From WQ


System Accept


System Reject


Manual Edit From WQ


Initial Population


Conversion


Hospital Account data push


Coverage updated at place of service

columns.name: REG_HX_FO_REV_ACC_C_NAME
columns.description:
The reason that a filing order change was accepted when it was reviewed.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Other


Charges Not Triggered


Primary Coverage Unchanged


Self-Pay to Coverage


No Claims Sent to Original Payor

columns.name: REG_HX_FO_REV_REJ_C_NAME
columns.description:
The reason that a filing order change was rejected when it was reviewed.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Not a Charge Transaction


Voided Transaction


Out Of Max Days Range


Already Retroadjudicated


Retroadjudication Not Needed


No Open System Batch


In Accepted Queue


In Rejected Queue


Orig Cvg Eff On Svc Dt


Same Cvg, Same Pln/Pln Grp


Same Payor


Supplemental Charge


CRNA Charge


Attached Insurance Payment/Adjustment


Patient Due and Paid Off


Same Payor, Same Plan


Retro Extension Error


Charge Bundled


Small Balance Due


Service Date Too Old


Small Insurance Due


Insufficient Security for Retro


Zero Dollar Charge


Matched Credit > $0


Invalid Acct Type


Reject All Chg Extension


Claim Submitted For Orig Payor


Do Not Bill Insurance Charge


Same Payor, Subscriber ID


Invalid Account Status


Dental Payment Plan Charge


Ambulatory Pharmacy Charge


Dental Predetermination Charge


No Effective Date


Bad Debt Transaction


Already Self-Pay


Charge Paid Off


Auto Profile Reject


Tax Charge


Auto Reject due to VFO Conversion


Home Infusion Adjudicated Charge

columns.name: REG_HX_FO_RV_CER_ID
columns.description: The rule (CER) ID that an automatic filing order change was associated with.

columns.name: REG_HX_FO_RV_CER_ID_RULE_NAME
columns.description: The name of the rule.

columns.name: REG_HX_FO_WQ_ID
columns.description: The workqueue (WQF) ID that a filing order review change was associated with.

columns.name: REG_HX_FO_WQ_ID_WORKQUEUE_NAME
columns.description: The name of the workqueue

columns.name: REG_HX_FO_REV_CMT
columns.description: The free-text reason given by the user that a filing order change was made.
